Rotation.RotationList: [Misc] Initialization|[Misc] Pet Management|[Misc] Pause Rotation|[Support] Automatic Buffing|[Misc] Instance: Combat Detection|Curse of the Elements|[Support] Alchemy: Lifeblood|[Support] Potion Usage|[Support] Racials|[Support] Frag Belt|[Support] Dark Soul: Knowledge|[Pet] Grimoire of Service|[Pet] Command Demon|[Support] Doomguard|[Support] Dark Regeneration|[Support] Imp Swarm|[Support] Soulshatter|[Support] Healthstone|[Support] Automatic Mortal Coil|[Support] Level 30 Talent|[Support] Level 45 Talent|[Support] Level 90 Talent|Metamorphosis: Doom|Metamorphosis: Cancel|Metamorphosis: Doom (Mouseover)|Metamorphosis: Soul Fire|Metamorphosis: Touch of Chaos|Metamorphosis|Hand of Gul'Dan|Corruption|Corruption (Focus)|Corruption (Mouseover)|Soul Fire|[Support] Life Tap|Shadowbolt|Fel Flame
Rotation.RotationNotes:
All new! Automatic Single-Target Demonology Warlock rotation based upon personal experience and SimulationCraft - Ready for 5.2!
With the new advanced Metamorphosis weaving, the profile now automatically adapts to strong procs and buffs and plans accordingly! :D
Support: - Comprehensive in-game rotation configuration via PQInterface
- Automatic Soulstoning of Tank/Healer targets - Automatic Healthstone at set percentages - Automatic Dark Regeneration at set percentages - Automatic usage of Racials - Automatic usage of Potions during Heroism .. and much, much more! Requires PQInterface v2.0+ for user customization.
Dark Apotheosis support coming soon!
Keybindings: - Left Alt: Doomguard - Left Shift: Dark Soul Knowledge - Left Control + Left Alt: Level 30 Talent of choice
- Right Alt: Pause Rotation - Right Shift: Level 45 Talent of choice - Right Control: Level 90 Talent of choice - Right Alt + Right Shift: Toggle Cooldown Mode

Rotation.RotationNotes:
All new! Automatic AoE Demonology Warlock rotation based upon personal experience and SimulationCraft - Ready for 5.2!
With the new advanced Metamorphosis weaving, the profile now automatically adapts to strong procs and buffs and plans accordingly! :D
Support: - Comprehensive in-game rotation configuration via PQInterface
- Automatic Soulstoning of Tank/Healer targets - Automatic Healthstone at set percentages - Automatic Dark Regeneration at set percentages - Automatic usage of Racials - Automatic usage of Potions during Heroism .. and much, much more! Requires PQInterface v2.0+ for user customization.
Dark Apotheosis support coming soon!
Keybindings: - Left Alt: Doomguard - Left Shift: Dark Soul Knowledge - Left Control + Left Alt: Level 30 Talent of choice
- Right Alt: Pause Rotation - Right Shift: Level 45 Talent of choice - Right Control: Level 90 Talent of choice - Right Alt + Right Shift: Toggle Cooldown Mode
